name: Kool Koalas City
description:
Hey there!
KoolKoalas is a game that encourages a sustainable lifestyle. The goal of the game is to reduce the amount of litter and pollution in an effort to create a healthy environment for koalas living in a reserve on the edge of the city. 

  •  Click on any building - play a mini game! The progress bar will fill up and the state of the city will improve little by little!
  •  Click on the forest - visit the koala reserve, clean it up, receive koins and customise it!
  • Click on the cute koala - it's your pet and friend. If you keep it happy, you will receive koins over time as a reward!

Your main goal is to clean up the city! Make it great for your koalas and you.
